Title: Day 4: 7:00 A.M.-8:00 A.M.
Plot:
Eighteen months have elapsed since the conclusion of Day 3. A commuter train bound for Los Angeles explodes. A man steals a suitcase from a passenger in the wreckage and then kills him.

Jack has been dismissed from CTU and now works for Secretary of Defense James Heller. Jack is involved with Heller's daughter, Audrey, and their relationship is growing serious. Jack is in LA for a meeting with CTU Director Erin Driscoll, who fired him a year ago, but he finds himself alienated at CTU by Driscol
GuestStars: Thomas Tofel,  Shawn Doyle,  Lukas Haas,  Elyse Mirto,  Jeff Griggs,  Will Badgett,  Matt Gallini,  Brittany Ishibashi,  Michele C. Bonilla,  Faran Tahir
